trans-unit.source: You cannot hide all subpages of a page unless this flag is set. Be careful - setting this option means that TYPO3 will allow a whole tree of pages to be hidden in one go!
trans-unit.target: Vous ne pouvez pas masquer les sous-pages d'une page à moins que cette option soit sélectionnée. Soyez prudent - paramétrer cette option signifie que TYPO3 permettra de masquer une arborescence de pages en une seule fois!

trans-unit.source: You should also consider the performance issues involved when hiding a large page tree. It might take a considerable amount of time to do that and if PHP times out before the operation is finished the results might be unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: You should also consider the performance issues involved when hiding a large page tree. It might take a considerable amount of time to do that and if PHP times out before the operation is finished the results might be unpredictable.
